metrics_conclusion: Salvame has higher complexity than the average song  in terms Melodic Complexity and Chord-Melody Tension.
key_conclusion: Salvame has sections analyzed in the following keys: C♯ Mixolydian, F♯ Mixolydian,  and A♭ Mixolydian.  Click on the linked cheat sheets for popular chords, chord progressions, downloadable midi files and more!
